::Feline::

She smiled sweetly at Skulletron. "DO you think that you and HotRod 
here can go and get them, make them swear allegence to Zardus and get 
them out of this ship?"  She brushed the tip of her tail on 
Skulletron's shoulder. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>       "Shit, my connection broke during that fight with the 
Maximal," He
> said.
> 
>      "But, I couldv'e swore their was a Predacon, no, 2, on this 
ship.  One
> in a cell and, one in a CR.  If you want to take them, then make it 
quick,"
> He rushed.
> 
>         Hmmm......Maybe, he should keep Feline, she was now serving 
as a
> valuable piece on the board.  Now, she just had to be moved the 
right
> spaces.

> > > We'll take you down!!!!" Then, Fenox tapped Astral's shoulder.  
He
> > turned.
> > >
> > >       "Ah.....Zardus, is it???  Alliance commander???  You think
> > you can
> > > beat us????  Well, let me tell you something.  I didn't come 
here,
> > to fight.
> > > I came here, to carry out an experiment.  But if I must fight,
> > then, so help
> > > me Matrix, I'll fight.  As long as I, Admiral of the Lavacons,
> > Astral, live,
> > > NOBODY IS TAKING ME DOWN!!!!  AND NOT TONIGHT!!!!!!" He said, 
and
> > then
> > > nodded at everybody.
> > >
> > >      Fenox sent a transmission to the others on the ground.
> > >
> > >       "Ok, I'm afraid it's the only way, team!!!" He said.
> > >
> > >     They all replied with a positive answer and then, everyone 
said
> > all
> > > together, "LAVA AND FIRE UNITE!!!!!!!!!!  BURN!!!!!!  LET THE
> > DARKNESS
> > > CONTROL THE HEAT!!!!" Then, suddenly, things started happening.
> > >
> > >        The Lavacons' bodies started changing a bit(ok, a lot).
> > Their optics
> > > went redder, and not just firey red, the normal way, they were
> > evillish red.
> > > And, all of their bodies changed from burning reds and oranges, 
to
> > evil,
> > > evil, blacks and reds.  An evil grin spread across each one's 
face,
> > being
> > > shown only by the fire in each one's mouth.

our
> > superior
> > > forms!!!!!  HAHAHA!!!!!!  Now, we are the Dark Lavacons!!!!!
> > > HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
HAAAAHAAAHAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!
> > > OHHAAAA!!!!!" He laughed, evilishly.
> > >
> > >           "Come on Dark Lavacons, while we crush these Alliance
> > fools, we
> > > can have fun at the same time!!!" Astral said, laughing.

making

Dark

it

flame

> > > everywhere in sight.

they
